Desc.entry: Provides impartial help and support to Sheffield employers to recruit, retain and train all staff. Offers Sector Routeway, an independent account management support service for all recruitment and retention needs. The service offers an in-depth knowledge of the sector and workforce needs and ability to broker wider partnership working. Offers support packages, coaching and mentoring support for employers, line managers and vulnerable and at risk workers. Offers Job Brokerage, the link between the Sector Routeway employer service and organisations supporting people returning to work (JobCentre Plus and employment and support organisations). Offers a responsive and flexible service to support all Sheffield's employers in the target sectors but with particular focus on Small and Medium Sized Enterprises (SMEs) and those at risk during the recession.
